hydrogenBenefits.title: Hydrogen Water
hydrogenBenefits.subtitle: Health Benefits
hydrogenBenefits.description: Hydrogen water is regular water that's been enhanced with molecular hydrogen gas, known as H2. Hydrogen is a tasteless, colorless, odorless gas that can combine with other elements, such as oxygen.

athleticPerformance.title: Improve Athletic Performance
athleticPerformance.description: Enhanced endurance and faster recovery for athletes.

metabolicHealth.title: Improve Metabolic Health
metabolicHealth.description: Support healthy metabolism and energy production.

transportation.mainTitle: Energizing Well-being: The Role of Hydrogen in Physical and Mental Wellness
transportation.mainDescription: A new approach to hydrogen use brings to light its multiple benefits—not only for the environment but also for human physical and mental health.

features.title: Clean Energy
features.description: Hydrogen intake has been linked to increased physical energy and reduced fatigue, providing stimulation without the need for artificial stimulants.

features.title: Mental Balance
features.description: The antioxidant properties of hydrogen are associated with reduced anxiety and improved mood, supporting emotional well-being and increasing telomerase activity.

features.title: Physical Wellness
features.description: Hydrogen consumption can aid in cellular repair and reduce inflammation, enhancing overall physical fitness and endurance.

features.title: Daily Vitality
features.description: Regular hydrogen intake is connected to improved mental clarity, better concentration, and increased vitality in everyday life.

features.title: Improved Quality of Life
features.description: Overall enhancement of quality of life through daily use of hydrogen products.

features.title: Future Outlook
points: Breathing Cleaner Air: Enhanced oxygenation for brain and body function
Holistic Health: A balance between environmental and personal wellness
Preventive Care: Reducing chronic diseases through clean technologies

transportation.conclusion: Hydrogen is not just fuel for transportation — it's fuel for a healthier, more balanced life.

description.first: Quantum Wellness offers innovative solutions for health and well-being, focusing on the power of nature and technology. With specialized services such as molecular hydrogen, clean breathing, and energy therapies, it promotes holistic health, prevention of chronic diseases, and overall rejuvenation of the body.
description.second: Quantum Wellness aims to create a new lifestyle where the body and mind function in perfect harmony with the environment.

biological.title: Biological

biodynamic.description: Harvested following natural cycles for maximum potency

hydrogenWaterPage.title: Hydrogen Water
hydrogenWaterPage.subtitle: Discover the Power of Molecular Hydrogen

researchMessage.title: Scientific Research & Development
researchMessage.description: Our ongoing research in molecular hydrogen technology continues to reveal promising results. Scientific studies indicate significant potential benefits for overall wellness and specific health conditions. We remain committed to advancing our understanding through rigorous clinical trials and evidence-based research.

content.minerals: The mineral and vitamin content of hydrogen water will vary, depending on the provider and where the water is sourced from. Some manufacturers infuse water with trace amounts of following vitamins and minerals:
content.sameAsWater: Hydrogen water has the same nutrition information as water.
content.liverStudy: In studies of people with hepatitis B and nonalcoholic fatty liver disease, treatment with hydrogen water improved liver function and reduced the amount of fat stored in the liver.
